meanings.definition: A narrow strip of land connecting two larger land masses.
meanings.sent1: The isthmi between the two islands allowed for easy travel by foot.
meanings.sent2: The isthmi was a crucial link between the two continents.
meanings.sent3: The isthmi was so narrow that only a single person could pass through at a time.
meanings.sent4: The isthmi acted as a natural bridge between the two land masses.
meanings.sent5: The isthmi was like a tiny thread holding the two pieces of land together.

meanings.definition: A narrow strip of tissue connecting two larger body parts.
meanings.sent1: The isthmi in the brain help transmit signals between different regions.
meanings.sent2: The isthmi in the knee provide stability to the joint.
meanings.sent3: The isthmi in the body are like tiny ropes holding everything together.
meanings.sent4: The isthmi in the body act as communication channels between organs.
meanings.sent5: The isthmi in the body are essential for proper functioning of the organs.
